docs.text: Compound CAD Help Center Welcome to the Compound CAD Help Center , your go-to resource for all things related to FreeCAD , ERPNext , and our specialized services. We’ve designed this space to provide clear and concise solutions for your needs. Explore our documentation, tutorials, and FAQs to maximize your experience with our tools and services. 📚 Help Categories 1. Getting Started Learn the basics of using Compound CAD tools, setting up your workspace, and navigating our platform. Overview Setting Up Your Account First Steps 2. FreeCAD Tutorials Step-by-step guides and examples to help you design efficiently with FreeCAD. Basics Introduction to FreeCAD Navigating the Interface Advanced Assembly Techniques Parametric Modeling 3. ERPNext Documentation Deep dive into ERPNext setups, workflows, and best practices tailored to your needs. 4. FAQs Find answers to the most common questions about our tools, services, and processes. 5. Contact Support Need help? Reach out to our support team for personalized assistance. 🔎 Search for Articles Use the search bar at the top to quickly find what you need. Whether you're looking for tutorials, troubleshooting guides, or product documentation, we’ve got you covered. 🌟 About Compound CAD Compound CAD specializes in delivering custom solutions for design and manufacturing teams. Whether you're working with FreeCAD , integrating ERPNext , we’re here to help you succeed. Let’s get started and make the most of your tools!
